// frontend/src/utils/api.js
const API_BASE=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||"http://localhost:4000/api";export const api={getProperties:async()=>{const res=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/properties"));if(!res.ok)throw new Error("Failed to fetch");return res.json();},addProperty:async payload=>{const res=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/properties"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(payload)});if(!res.ok)throw new Error("Failed to add");return res.json();},updateProperty:async(id,payload)=>{const res=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/properties/").concat(id),{method:"PUT",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(payload)});if(!res.ok)throw new Error("Failed to update");return res.json();},deleteProperty:async id=>{const res=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/properties/").concat(id),{method:"DELETE"});if(!res.ok)throw new Error("Failed to delete");return true;}};
